entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning then 30 percent chance of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 30%
